statements: SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule ORDER BY class_timing ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id > 1 ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, class_timing FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY class_timing ASC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id < 4 AND instructor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT DISTINCT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name ASC, instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name = 'Mathematics';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM class_timing WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, day_of_week FROM course_schedule INNER JOIN class_timing ON course_schedule.course_id = class_timing.course_id WHERE start_time > '09:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM course_schedule;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_name FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_day FROM Courses ORDER BY course_day DESC;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM Classrooms WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT course_name, course_time FROM Courses WHERE course_day = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM Classrooms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses JOIN Instructors ON Courses.course_id = Instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, course_day FROM Courses WHERE course_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE timing >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, timing FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY timing DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT * FROM CourseEnrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE timing > '2022-09-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, timing FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY timing DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClassTimings WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND start_time <= '09:00:00';

SELECT student_id, course_name, enrollment_date FROM CourseEnrollment INNER JOIN CourseSchedule ON CourseEnrollment.course_id = CourseSchedule.course_id WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollment WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM student WHERE class_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT instructor_name, specialized_subject FROM instructor ORDER BY specialized_subject DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM student JOIN class_timings ON student.class_id = class_timings.class_id;
SELECT instructor_name, specialized_subject FROM instructor WHERE LENGTH(instructor_name) > 10;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_date FROM course_schedule JOIN enrollment ON course_schedule.course_id = enrollment.course_id;
